content: frame your face with the elegant simplicity of this crochet cloche hat designed in bernat softee cotton the pattern is worked in the round to create a lovely spiral lacy pattern practice chain single_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet and more made in soft touchable yarn and a sculpted stitch pattern it s a comfortable and modern take on 20s chic add a dash of gatsby to your wardrobe with this unique topper materials bernat® softee® cotton™ 4 2 oz/120 g 254 yds/232 m sandstone 69009 or feather gray 69002 1 ball or 190 yds /172 m size one size to fit average adult head approx 22 56 cm circumference
